text: Bernardo Moreno (born February 14, 1967) is an American businessman and politician who is the senior United States Senator from Ohio since 2025. He was the Republican nominee in the 2024 election, beating Democratic incumbent Sherrod Brown. Moreno was born in Bogotá, Colombia. When Moreno was five, his family moved to Fort Lauderdale, Florida, where he was raised. Moreno became a U.S. citizen at age 18. ==References== ==Other websites== * Campaign website * Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:United States senators from Ohio Category:Politicians from Fort Lauderdale, Florida Category:Businesspeople from Ohio Category:Businesspeople from Florida Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Politicians from Bogotá
title: Bernie Moreno
